Articles.Content: It would be cool to have a display of acquired samples somewhere in the KSC kind of like how in Fallout 3 you could collect "bobbleheads". The first manned/unmanned crafts to land on each body could also be saved by the game and memorialised in little (or life-size) models. It would be cool see an accumulating collection of achievements like this. Displays could include the mystery goo and pictures of it in its various observed forms.
